HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Deadeye has been updated with the following new features: - Enemies can now use Deadeye as well. - Added toggleable autocast for Deadeye
Deadeye has been updated with the following new features: - Automatic weapons work properly now. - Increased upper limit of Max Deadeye ammo setting.

Deadeye has been updated with the following new features: - Added warmup to Deadeye. Configurable in mod settings. - Buffs to Deadeye focus. - Tweaks to the ai. - Localisation support. - Combat Extended support. - Various bug fixes.
